display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used only with arousal + hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation used only with arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hremba +hroa + hnrba + hnroa +carba + caroa + canba + canoa + oarba + oaroa + oanba + oanoa + marbpa + maropa + manrbpa + manropa) / slpprdp
